English: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort
francais: (expr. idiom.) la réussite dépend des efforts de l'homme

d.f: `事情~`的~`成功~`與否~`決定~`於~`人~`的~`努力~。

English: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort
With effort, one can achieve anything.
francais: (expr. idiom.) la réussite dépend des efforts de l'homme
